name: Asteroid Pool - PC Download
description:
Welcome to Asteroid Pool! 

PLAY IN BROWSER NOW: https://play.unity.com/mg/other/webgl-builds-70441

This is my submission for the Create With Code Game Jam by Unity Technologies (June 29, 2021-July 2, 2021) - Theme: MODERNIZING A CLASSIC

The goal of the game is to sink the colored balls into their respective matching colored pockets before Time runs out, your Fuel is empty, or you are struck by Space traffic!

Have fun! :)
